active_learning.discussion_prompt: Debate the trade-offs between implementing stringent FDA cybersecurity requirements (e.g., full SPDF and QS Regulation integration) and accelerating medical device time-to-market in life-saving IoT scenarios. Use real breaches like the 2020 Medtronic insulin pump vulnerabilities or St. Jude pacemaker hacks as examples. Consider prerequisites like CIA triad impacts and comparisons to HIPAA/GDPR.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
